title: Promoting Collective Learning in Schools and Exploring the Principal’s Leadership Role

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of educational administration or organizational management
context.additional_context: A qualitative research-based leadership development course for professionals. Focuses on strengthening practical competencies through case analyses of actual school settings.

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more major barriers to collaborative learning in school environments (time/space constraints, group member attitudes, receptive atmosphere)
Learners can analyze the principal’s role in four dimensions (administrator, team leader, collaborator, visionary) as a facilitator of collaborative learning
Learners can derive practical insights into collaborative learning models in educational settings by interpreting qualitative interview data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
